question.body: Based on your analysis, comment on the direction, form, and strength of the relationship.

alternative.title: R
alternative.p: Here is the scatterplot of the data.

From the scatterplot we see that there is a general trend of a positive relationship between cry count and IQ, and that this relationship seems to be linear but quite weak. In order to quantify the strength of the linear relationship, we supplement the scatterplot with r, which turns out to be roughly 0.4. The value of r tells us that the linear relationship between cry count and IQ is weak to moderate.
